metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3389 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - high
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux Kernel io_uring subsystem canbe exploited to achieve local privilege escalation. Racing a io_uringcancel poll request with a linked timeout can cause a UAF in a hrtimer. Werecommend upgrading past commit ef7dfac51d8ed961b742218f526bd589f3900a59(4716c73b188566865bdd79c3a6709696a224ac04 for 5.10 stable and0e388fce7aec40992eadee654193cad345d62663 for 5.15 stable).
